full_summary:
Education Coordinator - Lower Fraser River Area, BC (A)
=====================================================

### Solicitation Details

* **Solicitation Number**: 30004486
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-08-21T14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2023-09-01
* **Expected Contract End Date**: 2026-03-31

### Tender Description

Fisheries and Oceans Canada (DFO) seeks a qualified contractor to provide delivery and coordination services for the Stream to Sea program and related community outreach activities in the Lower Fraser River area of British Columbia. The contractor will work closely with Community Advisors (CA) to coordinate and deliver services, including:

* Coordinating and assisting with the setup of classroom incubators
* Delivering salmon eggs to schools
* Providing teacher in-service training on topics such as salmon life cycle, aquatic ecosystems, and environmental sustainability

The contractor will also be responsible for:

* Maintaining and supporting the DFO classroom incubation program
* Organizing teacher in-service workshops
* Providing technical support and logistical assistance
* Encouraging participation from teachers and ensuring recognition for years of service

### Mandatory Activities

The contractor is required to:

* Deliver the Stream to Sea program in the Lower Fraser River area
* Coordinate and deliver community outreach activities as defined in Appendix 1 (Scope of Work)
* Liaise with and support local community groups and attend community events
* Participate in DFO training, evaluation, and assessment opportunities

### Qualifications and Assesment Criteria

The contractors will be selected based on the following criteria:

* Variations or combinations of the above methods

### Procurement Information

* **Procurement Category**: Services
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Traditional
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Contact Information

* **Contact Name**: Joshua
* **Contact Email**: DFO.Tenders-Soumissions.MPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca
* **Contact Phone**: (343) 576-8144

For more information, including the tender documents and any amendments, please visit the Government of Canada's Canadabuying website at [Canadabuying](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/).
